data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Hordaland. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hordaland, Norway

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Hordaland, Norway today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Hordaland, Norway so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 41,756 believers in Hordaland to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 482,743 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bosniak people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Hordaland, Norway.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Hordaland, Norway to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Hordaland, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.
